name: Revolved
description:
This is a remake of the classic dot-eating yellow guy, but with a twist! Game created for Retro Jam 2021 by biyectivo with art by KittenAnimates.

Resolution was set like the Dreamcast.

The theme was SIDE EFFECTS and we think you're going to experience them when you eat a power pellet :)

This is an endless mode remake, try to reach the first place of the scoreboard! This game features a global online scoreboard. Choose your name on the Options menu and try to beat the world's high score.
